title: Brexit: UK-EU trade talks down to the wire
content: The UK and EU teams are under pressure to finalise an agreement, as talks continue in London.

title: Ethiopian Jews flown to Israel in latest operation
content: Israel's PM speaks of tears in his eyes as he welcomes the group, the first of an expected wave.
